file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Test specification for the translating parser
  version: 0.0.0
paths:
  /hosts:
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          description: A simple local reference
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'file_reference_from_root_schemas.spec.yaml#/$defs/PlainObject'
